name: Simple Image Resize
description: A simple dialogue to switch image syntax between markdown/html and losslessly resize images
author: bwat47

defaultResizeMode.label: Default resize mode
defaultResizeMode.description: The resize mode that will be selected by default when opening the resize dialog

htmlSyntaxStyle.label: HTML syntax style
htmlSyntaxStyle.description: Controls whether HTML image tags include both width and height attributes or just width

showQuickResizeInContextMenu.label: Display quick resize options in context menu
showQuickResizeInContextMenu.description: Show quick resize options (25%, 50%, 75%, 100%) in the right-click context menu

showCopyImageInContextMenu.label: Display copy image option in context menu
showCopyImageInContextMenu.description: Show "Copy Image" option in the right-click context menu to copy images to clipboard

showToastMessages.label: Show toast notifications
showToastMessages.description: Display brief notification messages for plugin actions
